title: Manjaro and Slimbook team up for the Slimbook Hero Linux gaming laptop
description: So not only are Manjaro teaming up with Orange Pi for the Orange Pi Neo gaming handheld, they're also working with Slimbook for the new Manjaro Slimbook Hero gaming laptop.

title: No Man's Sky Omega Update arrives with a Free Weekend and lots new
description: Even though Hello games are now working on their open-world survival game Light No Fire, they're not quite done with No Man's Sky just yet with the Omega Update.

title: Apple M1 gets OpenGL 4.6 and OpenGL ES 3.2 support on Linux
description: Developer Alyssa Rosenzweig announced in a blog post that support for the Apple M1 has been improved, with the latest updates bringing full conformant OpenGL 4.6 on the M1.

title: Plants vs. Zombies Garden Warfare 2 adding EA AntiCheat, breaking it on Steam Deck / Linux
description: It's only a matter of time before more and more EA published games move over to EA Anti-Cheat, and now Plants vs. Zombies Garden Warfare 2 is set to get it.

title: Get a whole lot of classic Capcom games in this Humble Bundle
description: Here's a good way to build up a whole lot of games with the Capcom Cup: Fighters & Arcade Classics Pack from Humble Bundle. Featuring some top games.

title: Helldivers 2 rated Playable for Steam Deck by Valve
description: Helldivers 2 is the bug-squashing sensation that's sweeping the nation. Skyrocketing to popularity in a way that the first Helldivers could only dream of. And now Valve has given it a Steam Deck rating.
